ARABIC: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: All mosques belong to Allah so do not call on anyone else besides Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All places of worship are for God; so do not invoke any one with God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that “mosques belong to Allah, so do not invoke anyone with Him”;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All the parts of the body to be placed on the ground during prostration belong to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘And that the mosques are for Allah only – therefore do not worship anyone along with Allah.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Masjids are for Allah, so invoke not anyone along with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that the mosques are Allah's, therefore call not upon any one with Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The places of worship belong to God; so call not, along with God, upon anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the places of worship are only for Allah, so pray not unto anyone along with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The mosques are for God's worship -- so do not invoke anyone else along with God --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the prostrations are for Allah; wherefore call not along with Allah anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The places of worship belong to Allah, so do not invoke anyone along with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the places of worship are for Allah (alone): So invoke not any one along with Allah;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the mosques are for Allah (Alone), so invoke not anyone along with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Mosques belong to Allah, so do not call to anyone else, other than Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The places of worship are for God. So do not call, besides God, upon anyone else.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:18] And [it has been revealed to me] that the places of prayer belong to God, so do not invoke, in them, anyone along with God, by associating others with Him, like the Jews and Christians do, who, when they enter their churches and temples, they ascribe partners to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the places of worship are only for Allah) they are built for the remembrance of Allah, (so pray not unto) so worship not (anyone along with Allah) in mosques; it is also said that the places of worship refer to the different parts of a person that touch the ground upon prostrating in prayer: the forehead, the knees, the hands and the feet.
